name: Beekeeper's Revenge [InDev] v1
description:
beekeeping game indev

WASD - Move

Left Click - Select bees and direct them rts style, place objects, interact with inventory/shop, harvest honey (if jar is in hand)

Right Click - Deselect all bees, destroy objects, interact with inventory

Scroll - Zoom in/out

Scroll Click and Drag - Move Camera

C - Re-center Camera on Player

Z - Reset zoom

Tab - Open/Close inventory/shop

F11 - Toggle Fullscreen (only supports 3840x2160 currently)

B - Debug Information

1, 2, 3, 4, 5 - Inventory Slots

F - Pick up item
